title: US 30-Year Yield Closes at Highest Since September on Fed Moves
description: Long-term Treasuries fell, pushing the 30-year bond’s yield to the highest level since early September, as the implications of this week’s Federal Reserve interest-rate cut and policy stance filtered into the market.
content: Long-term Treasuries fell, pushing the 30-year bond’s yield to the highest level since early September, as the implications of this week’s Federal Reserve interest-rate cut and policy stance filtered into the market.
